feature.name: Wrath of the Storm
feature.shortDescription: When a creature within 5 feet of you that you can see hits you with an attack, you can use your reaction to cause the creature to make a Dexterity saving throw. The creature takes 2d8 lightning or thunder damage (your choice) on a failed save, and hals as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Destructive Wrath
action.shortDescription: You can wield the power of the storm with unchecked ferocity. When you roll lightning or thunder damage, you can use your Channel Divinity to deal maximum damage, instead of rolling.

feature.name: Thunderbolt Strike
feature.shortDescription: When you deal lightning damage to a Large or smaller creature, you can also push it up to 10 feet away from you.

feature.name: Divine Strike
feature.shortDescription: You gain the ability to infuse your weapon strikes with divine energy. One on each of your turns when you hit a creature with a weapon attack, you can cause the attack to deal an extra 1d8 radiant damage to the target.

feature.name: Divine Strike
feature.shortDescription: You gain the ability to infuse your weapon strikes with divine energy. One on each of your turns when you hit a creature with a weapon attack, you can cause the attack to deal an extra 2d8 radiant damage to the target.

feature.name: Storm Born
feature.shortDescription: You have a flying speed equal to your current walking speed whenever you are not underground or indoors.
